mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_CODE, b.USER_NO, b.TITLE, b.VIEWS, b.LIKES, b.STATUS, b.DETAIL_STATUS, TO_CHAR(b.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, U.NICK_NAME, c.COMMENT_NO, c.CONTENT, bi.CHANGE_NAME, bi.IMG_NO FROM BOARD b JOIN "USER" u ON b.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" c ON c.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN "BOARD_IMG" bi ON bi.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO WHERE b.BOARD_CODE = 'C' AND b.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY b.BOARD_NO DESC , bi.IMG_NO ASC

mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DATE, VIEWS, STATUS, DETAIL_STATUS, LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE Like '%' || #{title} || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
